price: صالح وويل: دا ده اوښه، هغې لره د اوبو څښلو نوبت او ستاسو د څښاك خپله ورځ معلومه ده.
arabic: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla hādhihi nāqatun lahā shir'bun walakum shir'bu yawmin maʿlūmin
